item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Aaron Dodd. I’m a Software Engineer specialized in creating Full-Stack web applications. The ecosystems I am most familiar with are: C# Go Java I have a passion for Software Engineering and am primarily focused on creating lasting business value through Software Development.
